name: 翁文慧
objective: 分子生物學為現代生物科技尤其是基因工程的基礎學問。課程內容深入探討生物的四大類分子：DNA及RNA，蛋白質，脂質，以及醣類分子。並且詳細探討現代分子生物學之中心思想，包含DNA 複製、轉錄、轉譯等。
schedule:

Week 2 cells and organisms
Week 3 Basic geneics
Week 4 DNA, RNA and Proteins
Week 5  Genomes and DNA
Week 6 Manipulation of nucleic acids,    
Week 7 cloning genes for analysis  
Week 8 (04-18) 第1次評量 
Week 9 PCR 
Week 10  DNA sequencing
Week 11 Gneomics and system biology  
Week 12  (05-16) 第2次評量 cell division and cell replication
Week 13 transcription of genes 
Week 14 processing  of RNA
Week 15 Protein synthesis
Week 16 protein structure and function
Week 17 regulation of transcription 
Week  18第3次評量 Overview of the advanced molecular biology
補充教材
